packages.description: Ontdek de rijkheid van de Nespresso Grand Cru koffies met dit assortiment van 100 capsules. U kunt genieten van 100 kopjes koffie die variëren van mild tot intens.
packages.coffee_description_full: Ontdek de rijkheid van de Nespresso Grand Cru koffies met dit assortiment van 100 capsules. U kunt genieten van 100 kopjes koffie die variëren van mild tot intens.

classic.name: envivo lungo
classic.title: Potent and caramelized
classic.origin: Envivo Lungo is a blend of green coffees from two origins, India and Mexico.
classic.description: The new Envivo Lungo, specially designed for the morning by our Coffee Experts, will set the tone for the whole day. It is a long and intense cup that will thrill your palate and stir your senses. Such a good way to start a perfect day.
classic.roasting_description: The Arabica and the Robusta parts are roasted separately and dark to deliver high intensity with refined taste and a full body. The Robusta split is roasted longer and darker.
classic.aromatic_profile: A bold coffee, with caramelized notes reminiscent of aromatic woods and gingerbread. Served as a morning coffee, it offers a pleasant body and taste together with a high intensity.

classic.name: fortissio lungo
classic.title: Rich with a full body
classic.origin: A fine base of Monsooned Malabar Arabica from Southwest India and washed Colombian Arabicas to bring intensity, texture and richness.
classic.description: With the expertise of Nespresso applied at every stage, from the careful selection of beans to the roasting and grinding techniques, you will savour the pleasure of a Lungo at the height of its intensity. As in the ageof sailing ships, West Indian Malabar Arabica beans are exposed to monsoon winds after harvest to reveal a distinguished aromatic profile, rich with cereal notes. We blend these with Latin American Arabica beans to create a lungo with a truly intense character
classic.roasting_description: The Indian Monsooned Malabar Arabica and Latin American coffees that form the structural base of Fortissio Lungo are split roasted in order to generate a prominent body yet retain a rich coffee flavour, not overshadowed by roasted notes.
classic.aromatic_profile: A rich coffee, flecked with sweet cereal and malty toasted notes, that offers a pleasant bitterness with an exquisite fullness on the palate thanks to its round and smooth texture.

classic.name: vivalto lungo
classic.title: Complex and balanced
classic.origin: A complex and contrasting blend. The South American Arabicas, grown at high altitude, bring a light acidity, the Ethiopian Arabica adds its floral touch, and the Cerrado coffee from Brazil reinforces the character and develops the bitterness.
classic.description: Vivalto Lungo is a balanced coffee made from a complex blend of separately roasted South American and East African Arabicas, combining roasted and subtle floral notes.
classic.roasting_description: Separate roasting brings out the characters of the different origins. The grinding of the beans results in a coffee best enjoyed in a large cup.
classic.aromatic_profile: The perfect mix of several origins results in a rich and complex character: roasted, lightly woody, sweet cereal and subtle floral notes.

classic.name: linizio lungo
classic.title: Round and smooth
classic.origin: Arabicas from Brazil and Colombia that go into making Linizio Lungo are handpicked. Treated differently, the Brazil Bourbon beans are washed, then depulped, and dried in the sun with their mucilage; the Arabica from Colombia on the other hand will be fermented with its mucilage and washed afterwards.
classic.description: Mild and well-rounded on the palate, Linizio Lungo is a blend of fine Arabicas enhancing malt and cereal notes.
classic.roasting_description: The split roasting reveals the specificities of each origin. On one hand, longer roasting yields a darker bean that reveals the malted cereal notes of the Bourbon beans. On the other hand, shorter roasting of the Arabica from Colombia yields lighter beans and highlights the softer notes reminding of sugar cane, specific to its region of origin.
classic.aromatic_profile: Cereal.

classic.name: indriya from india
classic.title: Powerful and spicy
classic.origin: The Arabica and Robusta chosen for this blend grow in southern India, in the shade of large trees that also provide shelter for pepper and spice growing. Grown on high altitude plantations, the Robusta we use is a very pure coffee, very intense and slightly bitter. Only absolutely perfect beans, which have passed a rigorous selection process, are used for Indriya from India.
classic.description: Indriya from India is the noble marriage of Arabicas with a hint of Robusta from southern India. It is a full-bodied espresso, which has a distinct personality with notes of spices.
classic.roasting_description: The Arabica is lightly roasted, to preserve its subtle aromas. In contrast, the Robusta is well roasted to reveal its intensity and develop a full body. Very fine grinding supports the body and enhances the flavour.
classic.aromatic_profile: Cocoa and dry plant notes, as well as a spicy bouquet reminiscent of cloves, pepper and nutmeg.

classic.name: rosabaya de colombia
classic.title: Fruity and balanced
classic.origin: The varieties that make up this Pure Origin Espresso are cultivated by small coffee growers in the highest region of Colombia. Hand-picked and treated with the wet method to intensify its aromas, the coffee is then dried in parchment and transferred to the Paramo de Letras region, where the cold, dry climate preserves it.
classic.description: This blend of fine, individually roasted Colombian Arabicas, develops a subtle acidity with typical red fruit and winey notes.
classic.roasting_description: Split roasting of the different varieties allows the fruity and acidic notes to come to the fore, whilst adding body.
classic.aromatic_profile: Notes of red fruit, reminiscent of wine: blackcurrants, cranberries, and redcurrants.

classic.name: dulsão do brasil
classic.title: Sweet and satiny smooth
classic.origin: Subtly sweet, red and yellow Bourbon coffee beans are grown in the hill-top plantations of southern Brazil. They are harvested by hand, then pulped and sun-dried to allow the mucillage sugars to infuse the bean with a mellow flavour.
classic.description: A pure Arabica coffee, Dulsão do Brasil is a delicate blend of red and yellow Bourbon beans from Brazil. Its satiny smooth, elegantly balanced flavor is enhanced with a note of delicately toasted grain.
classic.roasting_description: Subtly sweet, red and yellow Bourbon coffee beans are grown in the hill-top plantations of southern Brazil. They are harvested by hand, then pulped and sun-dried to allow the mucillage sugars to infuse the bean with a mellow flavour.
classic.aromatic_profile: Lightly toasted grain.

classic.name: bukeela ka ethiopia
classic.title: Floral and wild
classic.origin: Ethiopian Arabicas from Sidama and other Western regions are hand-picked to create Bukeela ka Ethiopia. Treated differently, the Sidamo beans are washed and naturally sundried on raised African drying beds while Western regions Arabica as there, water is more scarce are un-washed and naturally processed.
classic.description: Composed of two very different Arabicas from Ethiopia, the birthplace of coffee, this delicately fresh and floral Pure Origin Lungo reveals unexpectedly wild notes of musk and wood.
classic.roasting_description: Bukeela ka Ethiopia is roasted in two parts. One split is roasted shorter and darker to enhance wild musk and body, the other split roasted lighter and longer brings the final flourish, the perfume, the definitive aromatic coffee reminiscent of jasmine, orange blossom and white lily, with its delirious, heady perfume.
classic.aromatic_profile: Bukeela ka Ethiopia is een heerlijk frisse en bloemachtige Pure Origin Lungo met onverwacht wilde tonen van muskus en hout.

classic.name: kazaar
classic.title: Exceptionally intense and syrupy
classic.origin: A Conillon Robusta from Brazil naturally sun dried especially for Nespresso and a rare washed Robusta from Guatemala bring a deep intensity to the blend without the typical harshness that Robustas normally carry. A washed Arabica from South America imparts smoothness to the blend.
classic.description: A daring blend of two Robustas from Brazil and Guatemala, specially prepared for Nespresso, and a separately roasted Arabica from South America, Kazaar is a coffee of exceptional intensity. Its powerful bitterness and notes of pepper are balanced by a full and creamy texture.
classic.roasting_description: So that each origin can fully develop its aromatic potential, Nespresso Experts have chosen the “split-roasting” technique. The Robustas are intensely roasted to develop a strong bitterness and body, while Arabica components are roasted longer and more gently to favour their finer notes and natural sweetness.
classic.aromatic_profile: Kazaar is a coffee of exceptional intensity. It is a full-bodied ristretto, rich in roasted notes. In cup it develops a powerful bitterness and notes of pepper that are balanced by a dense and creamy texture.

classic.name: dharkan
classic.title: Long roasted and velvety
classic.origin: Dharkan blends four origins from Latin America and Asia, including Costa Rica, Java and two other Latin American origins. It is a coffee enhanced with washed Arabicas, combined to produce a sublime experience and finesse in the cup.
classic.description: This blend of Arabicas from Latin America and Asia fully unveils its character thanks to the technique of long roasting at a low temperature. Its powerful personality reveals intense roasted notes together with hints of bitter cocoa powder and toasted cereals that express themselves in a silky and velvety texture.
classic.roasting_description: Dharkan’s long roasting technique at low temperatures ensures the heat diffuses right to the heart of each bean, revealing intensely roasted notes with surprising roundness. It gives the coffee its extraordinary silky texture and a long, bitter and pleasant aftertaste.
classic.aromatic_profile: Its powerful personality reveals intense roasted notes together with hints of bitter cocoa powder and toasted cereals that express themselves in a velvety texture.

classic.name: ristretto
classic.title: Powerful and contrasting
classic.origin: Composed of some of the best South American Arabicas from sources such as Colombia and Brazil, Ristretto also contains the great, lightly acidic East African Arabicas and a touch of Robusta for added zing.
classic.description: A blend of South American and East African Arabicas, with a touch of Robusta, roasted separately to create the subtle fruity note of this full-bodied, intense espresso.
classic.roasting_description: The beans are roasted slowly and separately to obtain an original bouquet bringing together acidic, fruity, and roasted notes. Its finely ground texture creates an Italian-style coffee: intense, with a rich flavour and full body.
classic.aromatic_profile: Strong roasted notes softened by notes of chocolate. A subtle contrast between strength and bitterness, acidic and fruity notes.

classic.name: arpeggio
classic.title: Intense and creamy
classic.description: Arpeggio takes its distinctive character and full body from a blend of Central and South American Arabicas. The long roasting allows each aspect to develop into an intense bouquet, combining cocoa and roasted notes.

classic.name: roma
classic.title: Full and balanced
classic.origin: Cultivated at high altitude, the Central American Arabicas bring finesse, whilst the Brazilian Arabicas and Robustas provide body and a lingering taste on the palate.
classic.description: The balance of lightly roasted South and Central American Arabicas with Robusta, gives Roma sweet and woody notes and a full, lasting taste on the palate.
classic.roasting_description: Light roasting and fine grinding bring finesse to the blend and create a short espresso, which is not too strong.
classic.aromatic_profile: Roasted and woody notes are revealed through the light roasting of intensely flavoured beans from different origins.

classic.name: livanto
classic.title: Round and balanced
classic.origin: This blend is composed of the most prestigious Central and South American Arabicas, found in Costa Rica and Colombia and is cultivated according to traditional methods to preserve their malted and fruity profiles.
classic.description: A blend of pure Arabica from South and Central America, Livanto is a well-balanced espresso characterised by roasted caramalised notes.
classic.roasting_description: A medium roasting, accentuates malted notes, whilst fruity notes evolve to create a complex and delicate caramelised bouquet.
classic.aromatic_profile: A round and balanced profile, typical of freshly roasted coffee results in a combination of cereal, malted and caramelised notes as well as fine fruity notes.

classic.name: capriccio
classic.title: Rich and distinctive
classic.origin: The presence of South American Arabicas grown at high altitude gives this blend a light acidity, which is balanced with the perfect amount of Brazilian Arabica and a touch of Robusta.
classic.description: Blending South American Arabicas with a touch of Robusta, Capriccio is an espresso with a rich aroma and a strong typical cereal note.
classic.roasting_description: The light roasting of this blend creates a rich character and preserves a light acidity.
classic.aromatic_profile: A typical cereal note balanced with a light acidity.

classic.name: volluto
classic.title: Sweet and light
classic.origin: The Brazilian and Colombian Arabicas that go into making Volluto come from small plantations that produce very high quality coffee. They are grown in respect of the environment and local traditions.
classic.description: A blend of pure and lightly roasted Arabica from South America, Volluto reveals sweet and biscuity flavours, reinforced by a little acidity and a fruity note.
classic.roasting_description: Light roasting preserves the cereal note of the Brazilian Arabica and the fresh and fruity note of the Colombian coffee.
classic.aromatic_profile: Quite present and diverse: fruity notes harmoniously balanced with sweet and biscuity notes.

classic.name: cosi
classic.title: Mild and delicately toasted
classic.origin: Arabicas from Costa Rica give this blend its characteristic cereal and lightly toasted notes, while the finest Arabicas from Kenya bring out its delicate fruity notes, both harmonised by Latin American Arabicas.
classic.description: Pure Arabicas from East Africa, Central and South America make this coffee a delicate and balanced blend with cereal and lightly toasted notes enhanced by subtle fruity notes.
classic.roasting_description: A light roasting, perfectly executed by the Nespresso Master Roasters, creates a delicate and balanced marriage of lightly toasted cereal and fruity notes.
classic.aromatic_profile: Mild cereal and lightly toasted notes enhanced by subtle fruity notes

classic.name: ristretto decaffeinato
classic.title: Powerful and contrasting
classic.origin: Composed of some of the best South American Arabicas from sources such as Colombia and Brazil, Ristretto Decaffeinato also contains the great, lightly acidic East African Arabicas and a touch of Robusta for added zing.
classic.description: Intensely roasted and rich in flavour, Ristretto Decaffeinato has the same powerful character and contrasting taste as the original Ristretto. A selection of the best Latin American and East African Arabicas is sophisticatedly blended with a touch of Robusta, roasted separately to create the subtle fruity note of this full bodied, intense Espresso.
classic.roasting_description: The beans are roasted slowly and separately to obtain an original bouquet bringin together acidic, fruity, and roasted notes. Its finely ground texture creates an Italian-style coffee: intense, with a rich flavour and full body.
classic.aromatic_profile: Strong roasted notes softened by notes of chocolate. A subtle contrast between strength and bitterness, acidic and fruity notes.

classic.name: arpeggio decaffeinato
classic.title: Intense and creamy
classic.origin: A selection of the best Arabicas from Brazil and Costa Rica with intense cocoa-like hints and a South American washed Arabica with indulgent fruity notes. The aromatic profile of these coffees is carefully preserved during the decaffeination process, which respects the coffee bean’s true nature, allowing us to maintain the strength and richness of its aromas.
classic.description: Dark roasted and rich in flavour, Arpeggio Decaffeinato boasts the same strong character, intense body and indulgent cocoa notes as the original Arpeggio Grand Cru. A selection of the best Arabicas from South and Central Americas enriches this blend with intense, cocoa-like notes. A split roast reveals the specificities of each origin, carefully protected during the decaffeination process, which respects the coffee bean’s true nature, allowing us to maintain the blend`s aromatic strength and richness.
classic.roasting_description: The split roasting reveals the specificities of each origin: longer roasting yields a darker bean and releases the intense, cocoa-like flavours of the Brazilian and Costa Rican Arabicas; a shorter and lighter roasting of the selected Arabica from South America highlights its softer fruity notes.
classic.aromatic_profile: Arpeggio Decaffeinato has the same strong character, intense cocoa and roasted notes as the original Arpeggio Grand Cru.

classic.name: volluto decaffeinato
classic.title: Sweet and light
classic.origin: Volluto Decaffeinato is a pure blend of decaffeinated Arabicas from Brazil and Colombia with delightful cereal and fruity notes. The aromatic profile of these coffees is carefully preserved during the decaffeination process, which respects the coffee bean’s true nature, allowing us to maintain the strength and richness of its aromas.
classic.description: Delightfully sweet and smooth, Volluto Decaffeinato has the same rich flavours and round body as the original Volluto Grand Cru. The selected pure Arabica beans from South America are roasted lightly and separately to highlight their specificities and reveal the sweet biscuity, fresh and fruity notes. The aromatic profile of these coffees is carefully preserved during the decaffeination process, which respects the coffee bean’s true nature, allowing us to maintain the strength and richness of its aromas.
classic.roasting_description: The selected pure Arabica beans are roasted separately to highlight their specificities: a shorter roast unfolds the sweet biscuity notes of the Brazilian Arabica, while longer but lighter roast preserves fresh and fruity notes of the Colombian beans.
classic.aromatic_profile: Volluto Decaffeinato has the same rich flavours and round body as the original Volluto Grand Cru as well as the same delightful sweet biscuit and light fruit notes.

classic.name: vivalto lungo decaffeinato
classic.title: Complex and balanced
classic.origin: Vivalto Lungo Decaffeinato is a complex blend of decaffeinated Arabicas from several origins including Colombia and Ethiopia with subtle floral and sweet cereal notes. The aromatic profile of these coffees is carefully preserved during the decaffeination process, which respects the coffee bean’s true nature, allowing us to maintain the strength and richness of its aromas.
classic.description: A complex yet balanced blend, Vivalto Lungo Decaffeinato has the same rich character as the originalVivalto Lungo Grand Cru: roasted, lightly woody with sweet cereal and subtle floral notes. It is a pure Arabica blend from several origins including South America and East Africa. The aromatic profile of these coffees is carefully preserved during the decaffeination process, which respects the coffee bean’s true nature, allowing us to maintain the strength and richness of its aromas.
classic.roasting_description: Separate roasting of the beans brings out the characters of the different origins and develops the complexity of the flavour: a shorter and lighter roast preserves the subtle flowery bouquet of the Ethiopian beans and the fruity notes of the Colombian, while a darker and longer roast reinforces the character of the blend and develops its bitterness.
classic.aromatic_profile: Vivalto Lungo Decaffeinato has the same rich and complex character as the original Vivalto Lungo Grand Cru: roasted, lightly woody with sweet cereal and subtle floral notes.

classic.name: caramelito
classic.title: Caramel flavoured
classic.origin: This blend is composed of the most prestigious Central and South American Arabicas, found in Costa Rica and Colombia and is cultivated according to traditional methods to preserve their malted and fruity profiles.
classic.description: The sweet flavour of caramel softens the roasted notes of the Livanto coffee. This delicate gourmet marriage evokes the creaminess of soft toffee.
classic.roasting_description: A medium roasting, accentuates malted notes, whilst fruity notes evolve to create a complex and delicate caramelised bouquet.
classic.aromatic_profile: A round and balanced profile, typical of freshly roasted coffee results in a combination of cereal, malted and caramelised notes as well as fine fruity notes.

classic.name: ciocattino
classic.title: Chocolate flavoured
classic.origin: This blend is composed of the most prestigious Central and South American Arabicas, found in Costa Rica and Colombia and is cultivated according to traditional methods to preserve their malted and fruity profiles.
classic.description: Dark and bitter chocolate notes meet the caramelized roast of the Livanto Grand Cru. A rich combination reminiscent of a square of dark chocolate.
classic.roasting_description: A medium roasting, accentuates malted notes, whilst fruity notes evolve to create a complex and delicate caramelised bouquet.
classic.aromatic_profile: A round and balanced profile, typical of freshly roasted coffee results in a combination of cereal, malted and caramelised notes as well as fine fruity notes.

classic.name: vanilio
classic.title: Vanilla flavoured
classic.origin: This blend is composed of the most prestigious Central and South American Arabicas, found in Costa Rica and Colombia and is cultivated according to traditional methods to preserve their malted and fruity profiles.
classic.description: A balanced harmony between the rich and the velvety aromas of vanilla and the mellow flavour of the Livanto Grand Cru. A blend distinguished by its full flavour, infinitely smooth and silky on the palate.
classic.roasting_description: A medium roasting, accentuates malted notes, whilst fruity notes evolve to create a complex and delicate caramelised bouquet.
classic.aromatic_profile: A round and balanced profile, typical of freshly roasted coffee results in a combination of cereal, malted and caramelised notes as well as fine fruity notes.

classic.name: leggero on ice
classic.title: Een delicate ijskoffie
classic.description: Leggero on Ice Limited Edition is een delicate ijskoffie met fruitachtige accenten. Leggero on Ice is speciaal ontwikkeld om thuis een milde, heerlijk verfrissende ijskoffie te kunnen bereiden.
classic.aromatic_profile: Een soepele en verfrissende koffie met aanhoudende fruitachtige tonen en subtiele nootaccenten.

classic.name: intenso on ice
classic.title: Een intens gebrande ijskoffie
classic.description: Intenso on Ice Limited Edition is speciaal ontwikkeld om thuis een intense en toch verfrissende ijskoffie te kunnen bereiden. Een rijke blend die ook met ijsblokjes z’n intense koffiesmaak behoudt.
classic.aromatic_profile: Een rijke en verfrissende koffie met aanhoudende gebrande aroma’s en subtiele accenten van hout en cacao.

pro.name: ristretto intenso
pro.title: Buitengewoon intens en stroperig
pro.origin: De Ristretto Intenso is een melange van Robusta- en Arabica-bonen uit Midden- en Zuid-Amerika.
pro.description: Deze melange van Robusta- en Arabica-bonen uit Midden- en Zuid-Amerika geven de Ristretto Intenso een krachtige bitterheid en peperachtige tonen die in evenwicht worden gebracht door een dichte romige structuur.
pro.roasting_description: Deze melange wordt geplitst gebrand. Een intense branding brengt de sterke bitterheid van de Robusta-bonen naar voren, terwijl het lange brandproces van de Arabica variëteiten zorgt voor fijnere tonen en een natuurlijke zoetheid.
pro.aromatic_profile: De Ristretto Intenso heeft een krachtige bitterheid en peperachtige tonen die in evenwicht worden gebracht door een dichte romige structuur.

pro.name: ristretto origin india
pro.title: intens en kruidig
pro.origin: Ristretto Origin India is het perfecte samenspel tussen de meest verfijnde Arabica variëteiten en Robusta uit Zuid-India.
pro.description: Ristretto Origin India is het perfecte samenspel tussen de meest verfijnde Arabica variëteiten en Robusta uit Zuid-India. Deze koffie heeft een volle body en een uitgesproken karakter met tonen van specerijen.
pro.roasting_description: De Arabica wordt licht geroosterd om de subtiele aroma’s te behouden, terwijl de sterk gebrande Robusta dankzij zijn intensiteit voor een volle body zorgt.
pro.aromatic_profile: Deze koffie heeft een volle body en een uitgesproken karakter met tonen van specerijen.

pro.name: ristretto
pro.title: Intens en aanhoudend
pro.origin: Een selectie van de beste Arabica-bonen uit Zuid- en Centraal-Amerika.
pro.description: Ristretto is een sterk gebrande, zuivere Arabica uit Midden- en Zuid-Amerika. De koffie heeft een volle body die een uniek chocoladeaccent onthult.
pro.roasting_description: De sterke branding van deze Arabica zorgt voor een volle body.
pro.aromatic_profile: Intens gebrande tonen van cacao en subtiele tonen van hout.

pro.name: espresso forte
pro.title: Rond en evenwichtig
pro.origin: De Espresso Forte is samengesteld uit de fijnste Arabica variëteiten uit Midden- en Zuid-Amerika.
pro.description: Deze sterk gebrande espresso, die uitsluitend is samengesteld uit Arabica variëteiten uit Midden- en Zuid-Amerika, heeft een complex aromaprofiel waarin geroosterde en fruitige accenten in evenwicht zijn.
pro.roasting_description: Een sterk gebrande espresso waarin geroosterde tonen en fruit tonen naar voren komen.
pro.aromatic_profile: Een complex aromaprofiel waarin geroosterde en fruitige accenten in evenwicht zijn.

pro.name: espresso leggero
pro.title: licht en verfrissend
pro.origin: Een heerlijke melange van Zuid-Amerikaanse Arabica variëteiten en Robusta.
pro.description: Een heerlijke melange van Zuid-Amerikaanse Arabica’s en Robusta, dankt zijn lichte chocolade- en graanaccenten aan zijn evenwichtige body.
pro.roasting_description: Espresso Leggero heeft een evenwichtige body.
pro.aromatic_profile: Deze espresso onthult lichte cacao- en graanaccenten.

pro.name: espresso origin brazil
pro.title: Zoet en zijdezacht
pro.origin: De Cerrado Arabica variëteit geeft deze blend uit Brazilië een ronde smaak en uitgesproken graanachtige en geroosterde tonen.
pro.description: Espresso Origin Brazil is een delicate melange van Arabica-variëteiten, met een soepele textuur en een mild en zoet aroma, aangevuld door licht geroosterde graanaccenten.
pro.roasting_description: De Cerrado bonen worden kort en licht gebrand voor een ronde smaak en graanachtige en geroosterde tonen. De Bourbon Arabica variëteit wordt langer en donkerder gebrand voor een subtiel zoete en aromatische smaak.
pro.aromatic_profile: Ronde smaak en uitgesproken graanachtige en geroosterde graantonen.

pro.name: lungo origin guatemala
pro.title: Karaktervol en fluweelzacht
pro.origin: De fijne Arabica-variëteit uit Guatemala geeft een delicate evenwicht, rijke complexiteit en een fluweelzachte textuur aan deze lungo, terwijl de gewassen Robusta, een zorgvuldig en selectief verwerkte specialiteit, structuur en souplesse toevoegt.
pro.description: Lungo Origin Guatemala is een ronde en gebalanceerde blend van Arabica en gewassen Gourmet Robusta, met intens droge en gemoute graantonen die het sterke karakter van deze koffie benadrukken. Geniet ervan in een Lungokopje (110 ml).
pro.roasting_description: Een korte en donkere branding versterkt/benadrukt/bekrachtigd het sterke karakter en de aromatische complexiteit van deze koffie.

pro.name: lungo forte
pro.title: Elegant en geroosterd
pro.origin: Een unieke en complexe melange van Arabica variëteiten uit Midden- en Zuid-Amerika.
pro.description: Deze unieke en complexe melange van Arabica-variëteiten uit Midden- en Zuid-Amerika kenmerkt zich door sterke geroosterde accenten en een subtiele fruitige toon.
pro.roasting_description: Intens geroosterde accenten van mout die de fruitige tonen benadrukken.
pro.aromatic_profile: Lungo Forte kenmerkt zich door sterk geroosterde accenten en subtiele tonen van rood fruit.

pro.name: lungo leggero
pro.title: Bloemachtig en verfrissend
pro.origin: Een blend bestaande uit Arabica variëteiten uit Oost-Afrika en Midden- en Zuid-Amerika.
pro.description: Lungo Leggero is een subtiele, zeer licht gebrande blend bestaande uit Arabica variëteiten uit Oost-Afrika en Midden- en Zuid-Amerika. Deze zeer aromatische koffie onderscheidt zich door zijn subtiele bouquet van bloemachtige tonen die doen denken aan jasmijn.
pro.roasting_description: De licht geroosterde Arabica variëteiten onthullen subtiele tonen van jasmijn.
pro.aromatic_profile: Subtiele tonen van jasmijn, oranjebloesem en bergamot.

pro.name: espresso decaffeinato
pro.title: Vol en krachtig
pro.origin: Een melange van Zuid-Amerikaanse Arabica variëteiten en een vleugje Robusta.
pro.description: Deze sterke gebrande blend van Zuid-Amerikaanse Arabica variëteiten en een vleugje Robusta kenmerkt zich door een volle body die subtiel geroosterde chocolade- en graanaccenten onthult.
pro.roasting_description: Deze sterk gebrande caffeïnevrije koffie kenmerkt zich door een volle body.
pro.aromatic_profile: Espresso Decaffeinato heeft subtiele cacao-accenten en tonen van geroosterd graan.

pro.name: lungo decaffeinato
pro.title: Gebalanceerd en complex
pro.origin: Lungo Decaffeinato is een complexe melange van cafeïnevrije arabica-variëteiten van verschillende oorsprong, waaronder Ethiopië en Columbia. De aromatische kracht en rijkdom van de arabica's zijn zorgvuldig bewaard tijden de decafeïnering, zodat de ware aard van de koffieboon behouden blijft.
pro.description: Lungo Decaffeinato is een gebalanceerde cafeïnevrije koffie uit een complexe melange van afzonderlijk geroosterde Zuid-Amerikaanse en Oost-Afrikaanse arabicavariëteiten. Deze koffie verenigt de smaak van geroosterde granen en zoete tonen met de subtiliteit en bloemige aroma's van Oost-Afrikaanse arabica's.
pro.roasting_description: Dankzij de afzonderlijke branding van de bonen komen hun complexe smaken volop tot hun recht. Een lichte branding benadrukt het subtiele, bloemige bouquet van de Ethiopische bonen, terwijl een langere branding een donkerdere boon oplevert die de uitgesproken body en geroosterde tonen van de Latijns-Amerikaanse arabica's weergeeft. Het resultaat: een gebalanceerde kop koffie.
pro.aromatic_profile: Een rijk en complex karakter met aroma's van geroosterde granen plus zoete en delicate bloemige tonen.

pro.name: espresso vanilla
pro.title: Espresso met vanille-aroma
pro.description: Espresso Vanilla is een gearomatiseerde koffie op basis van Espresso Forte, een complexe en intens gebrande blend gemaakt van Arabica-bonen uit Zuid- en Midden-Amerika. Een zijdezachte koffie die een vol en licht gekaramelliseerd vanille-aroma combineert met het complexe koffieprofiel van Espresso Forte.

pro.name: espresso caramel
pro.title: Espresso met caramel-aroma
pro.description: Espresso Caramel is een gearomatiseerde koffie op basis van Espresso Forte, een complexe en intens gebrande blend gemaakt van Arabica’s uit Zuid- en Midden-Amerika. De zoete karamelsmaak verzacht de geroosterde tonen van Espresso Forte, met als resultaat een aangename koffie die doet denken aan het karamelliseren van suiker.
